content: hello my name is coley wickiser. im looking for one of my old friends who id like to get in touch with again. the last i heard was she got married and has a little girl name VADA.and joined the army.i think shes staioned in fort bragg altho im not sure. her daughters name is a very unique name and i really hope to find her. her name is hannah hamilton. or her married name is hannah townsend. if you kno her please please contact me. thanks -c
